# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its quality and the value it brings, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and your potential benefit, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects a fair compromise between its value and your perceived worth, allowing you to enjoy its benefits without overpaying. I trust this offer will be agreeable to you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
